mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T17_PER_QUESTION ( PER_ID , QUESTION , STATE , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_DATE , UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{perID} , #{question} , #{state} , #{createDate} , #{createTime} , #{updateDate} , #{updateTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T17_PER_QUESTION SET PER_ID = #{perID} , QUESTION = #{question} , STATE = #{state} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} , UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} , UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , QUESTION AS "question" , STATE AS "state" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" , UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate" , UPDATE_TIME AS "updateTime" FROM T17_PER_QUESTION WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , QUESTION AS "question" , STATE AS "state" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" , UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate" , UPDATE_TIME AS "updateTime" FROM T17_PER_QUESTION WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , QUESTION AS "question" , STATE AS "state" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" , UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate" , UPDATE_TIME AS "updateTime" FROM T17_PER_QUESTION WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
